comment: The grammar part is simple enough. If you aren't familiar with certain things, read the book and watch the lectures. Same with papers. She's really vague about what she wants on the papers though and its really tough to get an A. She's very passive aggressive and rude. May have been the format but for that alone, I'd never take her again.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: By far one of the best professors I've ever had. I feel so confident in my classes this semester soley because of what I learned in her class. She wrote the textbook AND the COM entrance exam(TAKE HER). The people who don't like her are the people who don't like to work. Her standards are very clear. 11/10 would recommend.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria--Tough grader

comment: if you can .. take persuasion methods and strategies with professor Tom Vizcarrondo. I took it with both and he knows way more about the subject and is actually passionate about teaching it. if I could go back, I would have just registered with him first. I failed with Professor Grindel and passed with an A with Dr.V.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Prof Grindel literally wrote the book on writing for public communication. The class is challenging but helps you become a better writer and to prepare for the entrance exam. If you listen to her feedback and follow instructions, the class isn't bad at all. She even offers study sessions that help even further prepare for the entrance exam.

Prof. Grindel is a great person and a great professor. She is incredibly smart and funny. She is a tough grader, but also gives really good feedback. She definitely helped me become a better writer. I would take her again any day.

Professor Grindel is one of the nicest professors i've had. She is very funny and tries to make the class as entertaining as possible. She is very knowledgeable and is very understanding. She is always willing to help and gives great feedback. There is homework due basically every class which are easy 100's just to help. I would take her again!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: She cares more about telling personal stories than teaching and guess whats on the exams? Not her personal stories. Class extremely hard for no reason, 6 exams doesnt drop lowest grade. Doesnt care to help or explain grading. I passed the class but dont recommend taking her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Grindel is very knowledgeable on the subject and isn't very lenient in grading. Occasionally she is racially insensitive and voices her own personal opinions rather than sticking to course content. Prepare to dedicate a lot of homework time to this class as there is a worksheet for everything.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: I have taken Grindel before and I really enjoy her teaching style. This class is a few assignments but mainly tests. The material isn't hard. Do not buy the book because you will not use it. Grindel really cares about her students and is a great professor.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--Amazing lectures

comment: She definitely wants the best for you, but unless you're going to be able to commit a lot of time to the work of this class, and basically only focus on this criteria, don't take her. She's a great professor, but I would recommend taking Gilman or Latino, they understand not everyone can pick this up in a matter of weeks.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Grindel is one of the best professors I've ever had. She isn't lenient with grading, but she cares and she's always willing to help. I learned more going into my major from her than I did any other professor, she really makes sure you know your stuff before you leave her class. I can't wait to take her again in the fall!

Professor Grindel is awesome! She is a tough grader, but she does give good feedback. There are a lot of small assignments due pretty much every class. She is available for help outside of class if you ask. I would definitely take her again!!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Professor Grindel is a tough professor. She is very passionate about writing but not the best teacher. However, my writing skills greatly improved in this course due to her tough grading. Don't expect an A no matter how hard you try. She will help you but you have to seek it.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Professor Grindel is awesome! She's always willing to help you. I have a knack for editing and grammar, so personally I don't think this class is difficult, but the majority of my class may disagree. Even though you'll probably find this class to be challenging, you'll learn a ton! Definitely take her!

Grindel is the BEST. I'm not a Com major, but I love her! I took this class to learn about writing for com, and boy, did I learn a lot! She is strict on the details, but that's what this type of writing entails. If you read carefully, use your stylebook, and pay attention to detail, you'll do well. Don't take what she can teach you for granted!

Professor Grindel is TOUGH, but I would recommend her for this class. You learn a lot and she prepares you for the entrance exam. Try really hard from the start of class and you may make an A. 458 points is an A and I had 451 and she does not give points. Her assignments are tough and require a lot of effort, but don't slack or you will regret it.

Grindel is great. She's one of the most intelligent people I've met, but she's surprisingly understanding when students have trouble. Editing is a HARD class, prepare to become fluent in AP Style and have grammar rules etched into your brain. Great class though, learned a lot, I mentally edit everything I read now.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: One of the best profs at KSU! She is a tough grader - but gives great feedback to help you improve. Textbook chapters are short. Lectures are interesting. Coming to class is VERY important. Make sure you pay attention and do the homework. Don't rush through the HW or brush off the "small" assignments - they definitely affect your grade in the end!

Grindel is a good teacher and is enthusiastic with helping her students. Beware the final because all your efforts go out the window. Be careful with how you word sentences cause she is a stickler with that. I almost made a B but I made a C cause she mercilessly destroyed my last assignment and final. Overall a very opinionated teacher. Be careful.

Took the 7-week class. Grindel was great. Lots of work, but still manageable. If she lets you do rewrites of your papers- DO IT. Clear on what she expects in your writing, and holds workshops to help. She also wrote the book for the class and the Comm entrance exam. VERY helpful. An A is possible, but you must put in serious time and effort.
Very helpful, I took the 7 week condensed version of the class so it was extremely hard to keep up with. Grindel is a great professor but do not take this class if you want an easy A.

I took her 7 week course, it was difficult but I enjoyed it. There are a lot assignments that, which help your grade. You definitely have to do the work and not miss class if you take the 7 week course. It isn't too overwhelming. She had workshops during the week to help with your papers and such. I highly recommend her.

Prof. Grindel has got to be one of the best teachers I have ever had. There may be a lot of assignments to do in her class, but they are ALL genuinely help you. You know that she really cares about her students. She is amazing.  Expect to buy the book, which btw, is ACTUALLY used.   Also, AP style book is life.

Make note that she is very clear and helpful but if you want an A you must be perfect. She grades for perfection so you can not mess up at all. Expect a B or a C if you do all your work and work very hard.
This is a boring class and she knows it.  She tries to make it as fun as possible.  Lots of homework so get ready.

Super nice lady with a lot of real world experience in the communication field. I would definitely take her for writing for public comm if you have the chance (she wrote the book). Her grading gets tougher as the semester progresses and you will have either an assignment or a quiz due every class (or both) so don't expect to be able to skip.

She is my favorite instructor at KSU!  She's smart, funny, and truly helpful.  She genuinely cares about her students.  She gives plenty of assignments to help your grade and returns grades really quickly.  If you can get in to one of her classes, do it!!

She is very clear on what she expects. Her grading is a little more lenient towards the beginning and gets tougher as the semester progresses. Always willing to listen and work stuff out. It's a difficult class with a great teacher, just listen, show up, and you can ace it.

I took her over the summer and this was her first time teaching this class. She is a nice and funny lady but clearly shouldn't have taught this lecture class. Her test were confusing at times when this should be a VERY easy class.

TAKE HER! She will genuinely work with you to make sure you pass her class. She cares about her students. Subject is hard because of the new writing style but she does alot of practice to make sure you get it! Best 2135 prof hands down.

Grindel has been by far one of my favorite teachers. I heard Writing could make you or break you for COM and she made the class so easy to understand. Im already trying to find other classes taught by her.

Grindel has been my favorite teacher so far in college. She is clear, helpful and knows her stuff. She cares for her students and will help you learn regardless of how much help you need. The homework is not long or difficult but is very helpful. I definitely recommend her. Don't settle for anyone else.

Professor Grindel was probably my favorite professor last semester. I had her hybrid writing for Comm class. She is super willing to help you and makes the class much more enjoyable. She's extremely approachable, relatable, flexible, and personable. I'm taking her again in the fall!!

I can't say enough good things about Professor Grindel. The class is hard, just by its nature, but she makes it easy(ier)! She actually teaches you how to write with enthusiasm. If her class is full...and you can wait a semester...do!! She is worth the wait!
Excellent professor! Makes material easier than the reputation that proceeds it. Provides helpful feedback on work, returns grades FAST. Highly recommended!
Excellent professor! Makes material easier than the reputation that proceeds it, very helpful with feedback and quick to return grades. Highly recommended!
Excellent professor! Very helpful with feedback, quick to return grades, makes course and its material easier than the reputation that precedes it. Highly recommended!

Let's get real- the material is HARD! But thank the Lord I had Prof. Grindel! She kept class really interesting and fun- never boring. She's super funny and nice- keeps a casual setting in class. Gives MANY opportunities to make up work and raise your grade. Again- material is hard... but she'll do all she can to help you. I HIGHLY recommend her!

Professor Grindel was by far the best professor that I have ever had at KSU or any other university that I have attended.  She gives you all the tools that you need to truly succeed in the Com field.  She is a fun person & was worth waking up for an 8 a.m. class.  She's very nice, helpful, & straightforward with what she expects from you.

Professor Grindel is one of the best professors I have had at KSU! She makes the class interesting, is very organized and is very down to earth and easy to talk to. I highly recommend taking this class,b/c not only is it pretty easy,but you actually learn useful info for your future in the communications world.Just make sure you go to class&do work

Prof. Grindel is a great professor. The class is challenging but she makes it easy to comprehend. She's one of those teachers who actually wants her students to do well but wont chase after you. You have an assignment due every class period but at the end of the semester they all add and she drops the lowest one.

Fun class.  Difficult material, but all explain well.  Multiple opportunities to improve grades.  GO TO CLASS!  TURN HOMEWORK IN!  Grindel is fun, I will take her again if she teaches anything else I need.  I learned a lot in this class, and it wasn't unreasonable.  I recommend it!

You must attend class to know whats going on. Assignments due every metting(in summer 4 wk session). LOTS of writing but thats what the class is about. She is very knowledgable and is passionate about com. She is helpful but the class is not easy. I would take her again he style is pretty simple but lots of work
She's very helpful and knows her material very well. You do write a good amount and her grading can be confusing. Other than that great teacher
If you don't get a B in this class you need help.  She's extremely helpful and if you just do the work you'll be fine.

Overall Grindel is an ok teacher, however she changes the way she grades assignments with every submission. IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO PASS HER CLASS WITH ANYTHING ABOVE A LOW B/MID C. I really have not learned anything from her class and will hope I can understand newspaper writing for my next course.

Ms. Grindel loves what she does, and it shows in her teaching. She shows you what you'll be doing in the communication fields and is always willing to answer any questions you have. While she doesn't make attendance mandatory, you need to attend to get a good grade since there are several in class writing assignments. I highly recommend Ms. Grindel

I loved this teacher! The class was a challenge, but you learned a lot with AP style and writing styles. I recommend her. She is entertaining and genuinely cares about your education with communications.

She's a great teacher. This class proves to be really hard because of the content and the different style of writing. Don't take this class with another professor! she lets you re-write bad assignments, she also is very funny and a respectable professor. I highly recommend her
Mrs. Grindel is a great teacher, willing to help. A lot of assignments, but it's helpful since you're learngin AP style, etc. take her!

Ms Grindel is an amazing teacher. Even though her class was extremely challenging and I had to fight for my B, its probably one of the few com classes that I feel like I learned real information that I can use in my career. You better be prepared to come to every class even though it is not mandatory. There are a lot of grades, don' fall behind!

She is an awesome teacher, I would take her again if I could. You learn alot, class is not mandatory but you should go so that you get all the assignments. Alot of homework, you need your AP style book because you'll use it all semester but don't worry about your textbook, didn't need mine. Take her!
She is a great professor.  In the beginning I thought this class would be dull. She brings this to class to life and makes if very interested.  She is also very fair in class.

she is a great teacher! you do not need the book because everything you need to know comes from her powerpoints. i had the opportunity to travel to another country during the semester and she had no problem letting me turn in things ahead of time or late and she even seemed excited for me. she really cares about students. take her class!

This teacher is GREAT!! Made class worth going! Her tests are tricky but if you know the material and take notes on her powerpoint slides it's not so bad.  I LOVED this teacher and would take her class again anyday!

Good teacher, tough grader. The final was the only test (multiple choice/ short answer)... but she gives LOTS of quizzes all through the semester that can really come back to get you in the end. She's fun and loves thin mint girl scout cookies... hello extra credit

This is the second time I've taken her class - both times at 8am. If you're gonna take anyone at 8am, take her. She strives to  relate/get to know the class and *is* clear. The ones in my class that were complaining about her being "unclear" rarely talked in class or were even there. If you ask her, though, she'll help. Challenging, but fun teacher
YOU DO NOT NEED TO BUY THE BOOK. She does not like it and does not teach from it. She knows it all!

She is a really good teacher, tests are a little tricky though. She is the type of teacher you want to come to class so as not to disappoint. She cares about her students, and it's fun to hear about her baby, Beasley!

HORRIBLE CLASS!! She wastes most of the class just telling her life story and not covering the material that will be on the tests. She claims that her tests take her forever to make and they end up not having fair questions at all. Unless she really likes you, you will be lucky to pass. I do not recommend this professor for anything!
She is fun and interesting! Class is never boring.  I would definitely take her again - with a stronger commitment to attendance, as that is a big part of your grade.

Very organized teacher. She posts all of her notes on Web CT and follows her syllabus religiously. Her lectures are interesting and she talks about things that are relevant. I am currently taking her class and I really enjoy it. She does take attendance and expects people to be on time for class. Her assignments are very personal and easy to write.
No Comments
great teacher but tests are tricky, she actually makes lectures interesting
Great teacher!!! If you love writing, you'll love the class. Grindel gets her done.
ms. grindel is so great. she tells great stories and has a sense of humor and actually teaches, too! easy if you apply yourself at all.
Professor Grindel demonstrates methods and offers encouragement to help everyone improve their speaking skills.
